name: Reverse Nordic Curl
how_to_perform:
* Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor, close to your butt.*
* Engage your core by drawing your belly button towards your spine.*
* Hold a dumbbell or barbell over you with arms extended overhead, hands shoulder-width apart.*
* Slowly lower the weight down behind your head, keeping your elbows straight and core engaged.*
* Then, reverse the motion and lift the weight back up to the starting position, squeezing your lats at the top of the movement.*
short_summary: A strength training exercise that targets the latissimus dorsi muscle group.
